Dialogs.VideoDecoderTitle: FFmpeg Decoder and Filter Command Line
Dialogs.VideoDecoderMsg1: Enter advanced FFmpeg decoder commands here
Dialogs.VideoDecoderMsg2:
Enter FFmpeg filter commands (-vf) with comma separation.
Example: yadif=0:-1:0,scale=iw/2:-1
Dialogs.VideoEncoderMsg1: Enter advanced encoder command line parameters and performance tuning options
Dialogs.AudioDecoderTitle: FFmpeg Decoder and Filter Command Line
Dialogs.AudioDecoderMsg1: Enter advanced FFmpeg decoder commands here
Dialogs.AudioDecoderMsg2:
Enter FFmpeg filter commands (-af) with comma separation.
Example: highpass=f=200,lowpass=f=3000
Dialogs.AudioEncoderMsg1: Enter advanced encoder command line parameters and performance tuning options
Dialogs.MediaInfo: Video/Audio media information will be displayed here.
Dialogs.ProfileRenameMsg1: Enter a new profile name and click OK
Dialogs.OutputFormatNotSet: Encoding cannot proceed without a specified output format!
Dialogs.ForcedEncodingShutdown: System will shut down after encoding completes, even if errors occur!
Dialogs.ImageSeqCannotCopy: Image sequences must be encoded - direct stream copying is not supported!
Dialogs.NoEncoderAvailableMsg1:
No suitable encoder was detected. This may be caused by:
- Outdated encoder plugins
- Missing runtime libraries

Windows users: Ensure Visual C++ Redistributable is installed
Debian Linux users: Verify libstdc++ and libgcc are installed

For resolution, consider reinstalling IFME without modifications.
Dialogs.FactoryResetMsg1: This will reset all settings to default values. Do you want to proceed?
Dialogs.CodecSkipTestMsg1: This option disables encoder testing, which may lead to stability issues. Do you want to proceed?
Dialogs.FinalWarningMsg1: This action may cause encoder problems. Do you want to proceed?
Dialogs.TempBrowseFolder: Select an empty folder for temporary files

Logs.WarningInfo: WARNING: Do not close this terminal - critical process information is displayed here.
Logs.MuxingFailed: [ERROR] FFmpeg failed to multiplex files. Check the [Muxing Failed] directory for manual processing.
Logs.OperationCompleteShutdown: [INFO] Operation complete - system will shut down shortly
Logs.ContainerNotSupportAudio: [INFO] Selected container format does not support audio: {0}
Logs.ContainerNotSupportVideo: [INFO] Selected container format does not support video: {0}
Logs.NotingToEncode: [INFO] No encodable content detected - verify input files

frmMain.chkAdvCropAuto: &Automatically remove letterbox from all video streams
frmMain.lblAdvCropNote: Note: Enabling this option disables stream copying and resolution adjustments.
frmMain.lblAdvTrimNote: Note: Enabling this option disables stream copying.

frmOptions.chkMuxMp4EM:
&Empty MOOV atom
(Enables streaming before full download by placing header at file start)
frmOptions.chkMuxMp4FK:
&Fragmented keyframes
(Improves seeking by splitting video at keyframes)
frmOptions.chkMuxMp4SM:
&Separate MOOF atom
(Required for streaming services - places metadata before media data)
frmOptions.chkSkipTest: Disable encoder testing (faster startup but may cause stability issues)

frmAbout.lblArtWork: Character artwork by Ray-en (53C) for IFME Project

frmImportImageSeq.lblInformation:
Specify the frame rate for this image sequence:

Supported formats:
• Integer (e.g., 25)
• Decimal (e.g., 23.976)
• Fraction (e.g., 1/5 for one frame every 5 seconds)
